name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.1.0-72bd4d9f5bc7a4e5ebbc1cc9e8f5831ea08489a0 "index template [v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
